channel.title: Auto Restarter?
channel.description:
Can someone give me a auto restarter? Thanks very much. mine keeps doing this error!
[IMG]http://i188.photobucket.com/albums/z93/kedonot1/helpp.jpg[/img]
I got the new one someone just post but that anit working for me. it opens but never restarts.
REP+ to any one who helps!

item.title: Auto Restarter?
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

Why do you need an auto restarter? Canâ€™t you just use this as your batch script?
@echo off
:main
java Server
echo Server crashed, restarting
goto main:
break

Read full topic
